summary: In Highgate London, five young teenagers hoping to witness Pagan activity, camp in historic Queen's Wood on Halloween but soon discover they are part of the ritual when a mysterious Biker hunts them down.
cast: Dexter Fletcher|Cloi Mckee|Holli Mckee|Mark Harris|Tony O'Callaghan|Howard Lee|Magda Rodriguez|Billy Red Mackie|Kazim Benson|Madeleine Rose Witney|Maya Charlery|Rachel Summers|Fiona Maeve O'Brien|Josie Benson|Angel Makedonski
title: The Coven
